headline: KKR’s Profit From Asset Sales Jumps 45% in Fourth Quarter

headline: KKR Announces Intra-Quarter Monetization Activity Update for the Fourth Quarter
summary: NEW YORK, December 17, 2024--KKR today announced a monetization activity update for the period from October 1, 2024 to December 17, 2024. Based on information available to us as of today, with respect to the period through December 17, 2024, KKR’s Asset Management segment has earned total realized performance income, including realized carried interest and realized incentive fees, and total realized investment income in excess of $725 million. Realized carried interest drove over half of our mon

headline: Bain Capital says it will launch tender offer for Fuji Soft without Fuji board approval
summary: Bain Capital plans to launch a tender offer for Fuji Soft shares even without the approval of the target firm's board of directors, the U.S. private equity firm said on Wednesday. The...

headline: What Makes KKR & Co. (KKR) a New Buy Stock
summary: KKR & Co. (KKR) might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects, which is reflected by its upgrade to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).

headline: Palantir’s high valuation paints a stark picture of the S&P 500’s priciest picks
summary: You have probably seen warnings that after two years of double-digit gains for the S 500, stocks are getting pricey. Then again, you find warnings that the sky is about to fall down every day in the financial media.

headline: Fuji Soft rejects Bain's raised buyout offer and sticks with KKR
summary: Japanese IT firm Fuji Soft has reaffirmed its support for the second stage of a tender offer buyout from U.S. private equity firm KKR and came out against a higher offer from rival Bain Capital, it...
